alert.note: Alert for The Little Rockies (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 07 at 2:16AM MST until February 07 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: .Bare ground, strong winds, and low RH along with a frontal passage will act to bring elevated to critical fire weather conditions to the Little Rockies and Missouri Breaks today. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 135... The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a Red Flag Warning for strong wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 9 AM this morning to 6 PM MST this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 135. * TIMING...Late Morning today to the late afternoon. * WINDS...West 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 18 percent. * TEMPERATURES...As high as 65. * IMPACTS...Any fires that start could spread rapidly to the east.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in these areas of this Red Flag Warning.
